p.span: A RED VAN parked will be parked at the below stops with 2 individuals wearing Marshall Public School badges. If your student rides to/from one of these stops, please go here to pickup your packet.

p.span: LINCOLNSHIRE (VAN WILL PULL ALL THE WAY TO THE BACK): 11:35-11:50

div.span: New Security Polices and Physical Upgrades at Every School Building

br.span: Marshall Public Schools has added new security policies and physical upgrades at every school building in our district. View a letter describing the upgrades and what to expect when arriving at a school building. View Letter

div.span: School of Choice First Semester Enrollment for 2020-2021

span.span: Applications for all grade levels are now being accepted for the first semester of the 2020
-2021 school year. Classes start August 26, 2020. Submit applications to the Superintendent’s Office at 100 East Green Street; Marshall, MI 49068.

The Marshall Area Community Services (MACS), Marshall Public Schools and the HCB Banking Center are coordinating efforts to provide new backpacks and school supplies to students in the district. If you are interested in participating in this program, please contact Sandy Moffat, MACS, at 269-781-2954.

br.span:
Board Meeting YouTube Channel:
Link to MPS Board YouTube Channel
